import React from 'react'; import Header from '../../Components/header/Header'; import Footer from '../../Components/footer/Footer'; import Breadcrumbs from '../../Components/breadcrumb/Breadcrumbs'; import './contact.css' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const Contact = () => { return (

We’re here to help you!

Have a question, comment, or brilliant idea you'd like to share? Please contact Remit using the most convenient way below:

Call us today:6-146-389-574

Send us an email:support@remit.com

Or fill out the form below and we’ll get back to you as soon as possible.

Remit Store

70 Washington Square South New York, NY 10012, United States

View larger map
); } export default Contact;
